quote: You like to think that people, in general, and I mean on the scale of generations, are learning from their mistakes, getting better. But with what all I seen, I don't know if I could believe that.
quote_letters: YOU LIKE TO THINK THAT PEOPLE IN GENERAL AND I MEAN ON THE SCALE OF GENERATIONS ARE LEARNING FROM THEIR MISTAKES GETTING BETTER BUT WITH WHAT ALL I SEEN I DONT KNOW IF I COULD BELIEVE THAT
